numbered_ace_sentences: 3. The graph is about people who are asked a question.
4. The question is: Is the world getting better with each generation?
5. People who are 15-24 years old are more optimistic than people who are 40 years old or older.
6. I wonder about a cause of this difference.
7. Younger people may be more naive than older people.
8. Younger people may be more hopeful than older people.
9. Older people have more life experience than younger people.
10. Older people may have a more pessimistic view of the world because of life experience.
11. This relates to me and my community.
12. In my community, older generations make generalizations about younger generations.
13. Older generations say that younger generations are lazy.
14. Older generations say that younger generations are unpractical.
15. Younger generations still have hope for the world.
16. The title of the graph could be The Youth Perspective.
